issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

1.BaseUI>views>scroll views>scrolling zoom+pinch
2.when tapping on the test case, look at the + - controls
3.repeat until you get the results noted below

results: the controls are briefly drawn on the left before jumping the correct location.

{html}
fields.summary: iOS - scrolling zoom+pinch test case : + - controls initially draw in the wrong location - jumps on load. 4.0.2 and 3.1.2
